attributes.action: Government pays funeral cost for anyone that donates organs
attributes.additional_details:
If a person is an organ doner when they die and one or more organs are used then their funeral cost should be paid / subsidised by the government.

The cost of the funeral will be significantly lower than any ongoing treatment for the majority of illnesses the donation treats.

By covering the funeral cost a significant increase could be achieved by in organ donations and everyone will benefit.
